page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Although Deep Navigation pit is still very important, a local survey shows that more workers are finding employment away from mining. Light engineering, textiles, electronics being prominent. Within easy travelling distance of the district there is the Hoover washing machine factory employing two thousand people, Thorn EMI employing approximately thirteen hundred people and the Treforest Industrial Estate housing a variety of industrial enterprises: British Airways, Ford Motor Company,Rizla Papers to name a few.The construction of a further stretch of the A470 trunk road from Abercynon to Merthyr Tydfil has also provided employment for local men and youths out of school. Female employment in the area is provided for by the above with the exception of the colliery.
